CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed - Expired'),'[No Action Available]',IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Requires Follow-Up'), OR (ISPICKVAL(Accept_Reject_Status__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(Accept_Reject_Status__c, 'Reassigned By Sales'))) , '[No Action Available]', IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Awaiting Follow Up'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Future Follow-Up')),NOT( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Quality__c , 'Qualified') ),NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed - Expired') )) , '[No Action Available]', IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Quality__c, 'Qualified'),(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'SMB Opportunity')), Opportunity__c=null ), HYPERLINK('006/e?retURL=/' & Id & '&RecordType=012A0000000Vhy7&00NA0000000bC8S=' & Id&'&opp4='& Account__c &'&opp4_lkid=' & Contact__r.AccountId&'&opp17='& Campaign__r.Name&'&00NA0000000b8l9=1&opp5=Deal/Bid - Direct&opp11=Plan - 1%25&00NA00000063VHF='& Solution_ID__c &'&nooverride=1' , IMAGE("resource/1352358599000/MA_NewSMBOpptys", 'New SMB Opportunity'),'_parent'), '[No Action Available]'))))
CustomField.label: Other Action
